    Posts

    FAST HUG - ICU

    less than 1 minute read

    Published: March 30, 2020

    On ICU rounds/admissions, give every patient a FAST HUG (AE):

    • F: Food
    • A: Analgesia
    • S: Sedation
    • T: Thrombus
    • H: Hydration and Head-elevation
    • U: Ulcer prevention
    • G: Glycaemia
    • A: Antibiotics
    • E: Equipment

    An Approach to Diffusion Tensor Imaging of Auditory Brainstem Implant Candidates
